about.title: About
description: I am a Frontend Developer with a passion for crafting beautiful, responsive, and user-friendly web applications. With a strong foundation in **HTML**, **CSS**, **JavaScript**, and **React**, I focus on building seamless digital experiences.

Before stepping into the world of web development, I worked as a Mechanical Design Engineer for over three years, specializing in **3D modeling**, **2D drawings**, and **product design**. This background has sharpened my attention to detail, problem-solving skills, and structured approach to development.

Beyond coding, I am also a **Pencil Sketch Artist**, bringing creativity and precision into both my artwork and web design. My love for aesthetics helps me create visually appealing interfaces that not only function well but also look great.

experience.title: Frontend Web Developer - 1 Yr 3 mos
experience.company: Araveen Technologies Private Limited Â· Full-time
responsibilities: Experienced in developing and maintaining responsive web applications using React.js, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Skilled in implementing modern UI designs with Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, and Figma prototypes to enhance user experience.
Proficient in integrating GraphQL APIs for efficient data fetching and management.
Optimized project performance with Vite for fast builds and hot reloading.
Improved website interactivity using jQuery for DOM manipulation and event handling.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness. Collaborated with designers and backend developers to deliver dynamic and user-friendly web applications..

experience.title: Technical Specialist - 2 Yrs 4 mos
responsibilities: Created 3D models and detailed 2D drawings for automotive parts and connectors using Unigraphics NX12 and Creo.
Developed sheet metal parts for connectors, adhering to company standards and PDM system requirements.
Managed the creation and completion of ECR and ECN for engineering updates.
Produced assemblies, BOM, and detailed assembly drawings.
Collaborated with the Global Application Tooling Division to develop tooling components.
Utilized ZWCAD for drawing updates and managed product states using PDM link.

experience.title: Apprentice - 1 Yr
responsibilities: Assisted in creating detailed 2D and 3D models for transmission components using CATIA V5.
Supported senior engineers in developing transmission system components.
Created and updated design documentation specific to transmission systems.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure design adherence to engineering, manufacturing, and safety standards.
